mdRecord.dcterms:title: Pre-war Correspondence to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Floyd C.H. from Jas. A. Mahone
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Pre-war correspondence, April 16, 1861, to Capt. C. M. Stigleman at Floyd C.H. from Jas. A. Mahone, State Armorer, subject issue of arms and ammunition, 1 original piece.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Soldiers
United States
Correspondence
